mapper.insert: INSERT ignore INTO driveDataMain (userId,habitId,driveStartTime,driveEndTime,driveTimes,driveDistance, maxSpeed,createTime,validStatus,avgSpeed, speedUpTimes,brakeTimes,turnTimes,overspeedTimes,speed120To129Times,speed130To139Times, speed140To149Times,speed150To159Times,speed160UpTimes) VALUES (#{userId}, #{habitId}, #{driveStartTime}, #{driveEndTime}, #{driveTimes},#{driveDistance}, #{maxSpeed},now(), #{validStatus}, #{avgSpeed}, #{speedUpTimes}, #{brakeTimes}, #{turnTimes},#{overspeedTimes}, #{speed120To129Times}, #{speed130To139Times}, #{speed140To149Times}, #{speed150To159Times},#{speed160UpTimes})
mapper.select: SELECT * from driveDataMain where userId=#{userId} and habitId=#{habitId}
